title: The Ritual of Decay
goal: The group interrupts Valerius's ritual, preventing a major blight escalation and leading directly into the final confrontation.
stakes_shift: The fate of the city, possibly the entire region, hangs on their success in stopping the ritual, with failure meaning widespread devastation.

bridge.from_prev: The group has discovered Valerius's ritual chamber and the imminent threat.
bridge.to_next: Eldrin confronts Valerius directly in a climactic magical and physical battle.

sections.title: Intervention
sections.intent: The group launches their attack to disrupt the ritual, facing Valerius's remaining forces.

scenes.summary: The group bursts into the chamber, launching a desperate assault to disrupt the ritual, clashing with Valerius's loyal, blighted guards.
scenes.outcome: The group successfully interrupts Valerius's ritual, preventing its catastrophic completion.

sections.title: Valerius's Fury
sections.intent: Valerius reacts with extreme anger and reveals his own blighted powers.

scenes.summary: Valerius, enraged by their interference, sheds his human guise, revealing his own corruption and wielding dark, blighted magic.
scenes.outcome: Valerius reveals his own corrupted form and wields dark magic, personally joining the fight.

sections.title: A Desperate Stand
sections.intent: The group fights a pitched battle against Valerius and his remaining corrupted forces.

scenes.summary: A fierce battle ensues, Eldrin's renewed magic clashing with Valerius's blight-fueled power, while Lyra and Kael protect Seraphina.
scenes.outcome: The group engages in a desperate, pitched battle against Valerius and his corrupted forces.
